attributes.action: Abolish our armed forces in their present form, and replace with an Improved Customs/Coastguard/Home Security Force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every war the UK fights has a negative impact - not just on those killed and injured (and usually more civilans than soldiers become casualties), but on our relations with other countries around the world.  We need to protect our borders and security, but not by fighting in countries that are no direct threat to us.
